messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Message board about this list/kids aging
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 29/07/2003 22:00:09 Pacific Daylight Time, ... Good to hear that Pam. We can get so caught up in stuff that doesn t matter. DS almost 8 is
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 29/07/2003 22:00:09 Pacific Daylight Time,
pamsoroosh@... writes:


>
> I know you all have heard this a million times but oh-my-goodness just
> let everything else go - enjoy those moments with your young children -
> because they SURE do fly by.
>
>

Good to hear that Pam. We can get so caught up in stuff that doesn't matter.
DS almost 8 is on his first sleepover tonight. I really miss him, but am
excited also.
Nancy in BC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
